import React, {useState} from "react"; import axios from "axios"; import Navbar from "components/Navbar"; import Footer from "components/Footer"; export default function Login() { const [email, setEmail] = useState('') const [phone, setPhone] = useState('') const [password, setPassword] = useState('') const [fullName, setFullName] = useState('') const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() const Registered = { fullName: fullName, password: password, phone: phone, email: email } axios.post('http://localhost:4000/app/login', Registered) .then(response => console.log(response.data)) wins } return ( <>
REGISTER
Please Input your Credentials
setEmail(e.target.value)} className="border-0 px-3 py-3 placeholder-gray-400 text-gray-700 bg-white rounded text-sm shadow focus:outline-none focus:ring w-full" placeholder="Email" style={{ transition: "all .15s ease" }} />
setPassword(e.target.value)} className="border-0 px-3 py-3 placeholder-gray-400 text-gray-700 bg-white rounded text-sm shadow focus:outline-none focus:ring w-full" placeholder="Password" style={{ transition: "all .15s ease" }} />
setFullName(e.target.value)} className="border-0 px-3 py-3 placeholder-gray-400 text-gray-700 bg-white rounded text-sm shadow focus:outline-none focus:ring w-full" placeholder="First & Last Name" style={{ transition: "all .15s ease" }} />
setPhone(e.target.value)} className="border-0 px-3 py-3 placeholder-gray-400 text-gray-700 bg-white rounded text-sm shadow focus:outline-none focus:ring w-full" placeholder="Phone" style={{ transition: "all .15s ease" }} />
); }
